Scan the QR Code to add me as a friend on Sasai.
Scan the QR Code to save my contact information.
A link will be sent to your email address after you click submit. Please click on the link to complete the verification process.
Success! You can now login to Sasai using your email and password.
Are you sure you want to unlink your email address?
If you unlink your email address %1$s will no longer be associated with your account.
The above mobile number is currently linked to your Sasai account.
Bind your mobile phone number. You can use your number to log in, retrieve your account and find friends who are on Sasai.
Success! You can now login to Sasai using your new mobile number.
Please enter a valid email address.
Your Sasai password has been reset.
Your Sasai password has been successfully reset.
You have successfully registered for Sasai.
You have successfully registered for Sasai. Go and set your password now.
You don\'t have password.\nGo and set your password now.
Sasai passwords must be 6-16 characters long and must contain lowercase, uppercase, and numeric characters.
Your new Sasai password cannot be the same as the old one.
\nPlease use flash light. Image too dark.
After resetting, your current QR Code becomes invalid and a new one is created.
This QR code is valid for the next 7 days.

Please use flash light. Image too dark.
Your Sasai account is currently logged in on another device. If this is not you, please change your password.
Your Sasai account is currently logged in on another device. If this is not you, please change your password.
Temporary data such as images, texts and logs cached by Sasa will not affect the normal operation of Sasai
Clear the historical data of IM chat messages.
Clear media data, including pictures, videos, audio data.
Clear all documents such as Word, Excel, PDF, and powerpoint saved through Sasai chat sharing.
Clearing cache will remove videos, pictures and audio data and will require this device to download this data again in order to be viewed. Do you still want to clear cache?
Clearing IM messages will clear all chat history older than %1$d days and you will not be able to recover these messages.Do you still want to clear IM messages?
Clearing date will remove all Sasai videos and audios and will require this device to download this data again in order to be viewed.Do you still want to clear data?
Clearing document will remove all word documents, excel documents, pdf, powerpoint etc shared via Sasai Chat and will not be able to recover.Do you still want to clear data?
Enabling Night Mode will mute Sasai notifications between 23:00 to 07:00
Are you sure you want to Log Out?
If you clear chat history, all messages will be deleted.
If off, you will not receive message notifications.

Backup your media and messages to Google Drive. You can synchronize the data back to your device or new android device. NB: Messages and media backed up in Google Drive are not protected by Sasai
You can download the back up file from the Google Drive and sync directly to your phone. Please note that the current chat history will be overwritten after downloading.

Open the photo page of your passport / asylum / RSA ID. Take a photo of your face next to the photo page of your passport / asylum / RSA ID.

Hi %1$s. Please pay using the following details: 

Transaction ref: %2$s; 

total to pay: %3$s 

Your quote has been successfully generated, Kindly visit your nearest agent and pay in %4$s using the following transaction reference: %5$s.

status: This quote will expire after 12 hours.

Have a good day

Transaction ref: %2$s; 
total to pay: %3$s

status: This quote will expire after 12 hours.
